Text:
good quality. the screen is cut off at the very top and bottom, but still watchable.

I didnt like the models used they seemed really bland and unemotional.

story was good though.

quality=8.7
actual show quality=6.5

@Psycho817
This was from the SD version of the Hub, which letterboxed Prime to fit a 4:3 screen. All the encoder cut off was black bar and a bit of network watermarking.
